'''''Nothing but a Hound Dog...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to fix [[Seymour]] during the {{Quest|There Will Come Soft Rains}}.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
*
-->
==Trivia==
* The name and context of this achievement is a reference to the quest "[https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/Nothin%27_But_a_Hound_Dog Nothin' but a Hound Dog]" in the 2011 video game ''{{w|Fallout: New Vegas}}'', which is focused on repairing a cyborg dog. The phrase "Nothin' but a Hound Dog" is a reference to the 1952 song ''{{w|Hound Dog (song)|Hound Dog}}''.
